article.title: Northrop Awarded Global Combat Support System Contract Modification
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Information Technology Incorporated, McLean, Virginia, was awarded a $298,934,381 cost-plus-incentive-fee contract modification in support of the Global Combat Support System, Army. The contracting authority is the U.S. Army Contracting Command, Rock Island, Illinois.
